霡字的基本解释

霡
mài
古同“霢”。

霡字的汉语字典释义

[①]［mài］
［《廣韻》莫獲切，入麥，明。］
亦作“霡1”。
(1)见“霢霂”。
(2)汗流貌。

霡字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【雨字部】　霡； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1377第03
【集韻】莫獲切【韻會】【正韻】莫白切，?音麥。【釋名】霡霂，小雨也。言裁霡歷霑漬，如人沐頭，惟及其上枝，而根不濡也。【爾雅·釋天】小雨謂之霡霂。【詩·小雅】益之以霡霂。【左思·吳都賦】流汗霡霂，而中逵泥濘。　【說文】本作霢。【集韻】或作䨫。

霡字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
霡字的起名意思

小雨。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
mài
The ancient same as "圡".
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［mài］
["Guangyun" is not cut, enter the wheat, Ming. ]
Also known as "霡1".
(1) See "圡霂".
(2) Sweat appearance.
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Rain Characters】　霡; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 1377 No. 03
[Ji Yun] Mo Huoqie [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Mo Baiqie,? Yin Mai. 【Release name】Fei Feng, Xiao Yu also. Words and history are stained, like a person's head, but its branches, but the roots are not. [Erya·Shitian] Light rain is said to be "Zhou Feng". 【Poetry·Xiaoya】Yizhiyiqi. [Zuo Si·Wu Du Fu] Sweat and muddy.　【Said the text】This is made of 圡. [Ji Yun] or as a ling.
